name: Phil
quote: My life is so much better than it was a year ago.  I feel like I have a lot to look forward to now.
para1: Phil likes to get involved in something new, whether it's learning Guitar or volunteering at a local disabled children's charity.  His Personal Assistants are there to help him do what he wants to and offer him support when he needs it.  He'd like to get a job, and is working with his Personal Assistant to find what's best for him.

link1.ident: New ways of thinking about Citizenship
